sense.gloss: historical document, archives, old manuscript, paleograph
pre-Meiji era document addressed to someone in particular

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑物置↑↓ものおき↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑偶然↑↓ぐうぜん↓いくつかの|↑古文書|↑↓こもんじょ↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけた。
sdata.e: He came across some old documents in the closet.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑物置↑↓ものおき↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑偶然↑↓ぐうぜん↓いくつかの|↑古文書|↑↓こもんじょ↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけた。
sdata.e: She came across some old documents in the closet.
